code: import React,{Component}from'react';import{connect}from'react-redux';import{Page,Navbar,List,ListItem,ListButton}from'framework7-react';import rpc from'utils/rpc';import{updateMember,removeMember}from'store/tablet/members/actions';class MemberItem extends Component{async setRank(rank){const{member}=this.props;if(!rank||member.rank===rank.name)return;await rpc.callServer('FactionLeader-SetRank',[member.userId,rank.id]);this.props.updateMember({...member,rank:rank.name});member.rank=rank.name;this.forceUpdate();}async kick(){const{userId:member}=this.props.member;await rpc.callServer('FactionLeader-Kick',member);this.props.removeMember(member);this.props.f7router.back();}render(){const{member}=this.props;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Page,null,/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Navbar,{title:"\u0423\u0447\u0430\u0441\u043D\u0438\u043A",backLink:"\u041D\u0430\u0437\u0430\u0434"}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(List,{inset:true},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(ListItem,{title:"\u0418\u043C\u044F",after:member.name}),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(ListItem,{link:"rank/",title:"\u0420\u0430\u043D\u0433",after:member.rank,routeProps:{selected:member.rank,onSelect:this.setRank.bind(this)}})),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(List,{inset:true},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(ListButton,{title:"\u0417\u0432\u0456\u043B\u044C\u043D\u0438\u0442\u0438",color:"red",onClick:this.kick.bind(this)})));}}const mapDispatchToProps={updateMember,removeMember};export default connect(()=>({}),mapDispatchToProps)(MemberItem);
